entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: ICommand.Null #107435
  • Source generators are not shipping symbols #107421
    9.0.0
  • b425314 test failing due to StackOverflow in nativeaot outerloop runs (CET+CFG leg) #107418
  • [8.0] Test assert failure in Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder.Tests.ConfigurationBinderTests.BindCanReadStaticProperty #107413
    8.0.x
  • [9.0] PosixSignalRegistrationTests.ExternalConsoleManipulation_RegistrationRemoved_UnregisterSucceeds test crash #107412
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Plane.Project #107407
  • Request: make lttng-ust an optional build dependency #107406
  • WASI components import `wasi:cli/environemnt` and `wasi:cli/exit` when not being used #107405
    10.0.0
  • DateTime.now alway return utc time in dotnet 8.0.1 #107399
  • NativeAOT incorrect native code when assigning unmanaged function pointer to struct member #107396
  • Why Dotnet call syslog(using DllImport("libc")) slower than Java(using Native.loadLibrary("c"))? #107393
  • [s390x] Undefined behaviour in float32 #107387
  • [RISC-V] FP structs larger than 16 bytes in interops #107386

Closed

  • NullReferenceException invoking superclass method, seems "this" disappeared #106089
  • [ppc64le] Unable to load the service index for source https://pkgs.dev.azure.com/dnceng/public/..../index.json #106074
  • Secondary frame stackoverflow test failure on linux #107226
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/stackoverflow/stackoverflowtester/stackoverflowtester.cmd #106742
    10.0.0
  • [Infra][NativeAOT-iOS] Runtime tests workitems not getting sent to helix #107346
  • Test failure: GC/Features/SustainedLowLatency/scenario/scenario.sh #100567
    9.0.0
  • Dotnet build hangs while building libs.tests natively using cross built dotnet sdk #101121
  • How to pass APPDOMAIN_IGNORE_UNHANDLED_EXCEPTIONS using hostfxr #39587
    Future
  • Port System.Security docs for .NET 9 APIs #106790
    9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Method overrides with covariant return type don't work in all cases #96175
    9.0.0
  • Stack Walk fails in non-full dumps of a SingleFile process #107374
  • Down-level TimeProviderTaskExtensions CancellationToken behavior is inconsistent with Task #106996
    9.0.0
  • JIT SVE: Assertion failed 'secondId->idReg1() != secondId->idReg4()' during 'Emit code' #106867
    9.0.0
  • JIT SVE: Assertion failed 'targetReg != embMaskOp2Reg' during 'Generate code' #106864
    9.0.0
  • JIT incorrectly identify program as invalid #107391
  • Question: CA2012 ValueTask message incorrect for discards? #107394
  • [WASI][AOT] LLVM ERROR: out of memory #101533
    10.0.0
  • Blazor Wasm different output between build and publish #105937
    9.0.0
  • System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters CI failure. #107309
  • Add Negotiate and MultipleSchemes code to the System.net test Prerequisites #17845

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] ARM64-SVE: Delay free all ops within conditional select #107436
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Enable the log profiler #107434
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix incorrect handle type array/count when FEATURE_SIZED_REF_HANDLES is not defined #107433
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Disable ilasm tests for nativeaot test runs #107432
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Fix EVP_MAC_CTX cleanup in one shot #107431
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm] Implement MINT_NEWARR in jiterpreter #107430
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add new properties for the new non-JSON-based deb tooling #107429
    blocking, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Track that kmov instructions may write to GPR register #107428
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixing 0 length issue with constructor #107427
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Make ComponentActivator.[LoadAssemblyAnd]GetFunctionPointer set initialize out pointer to 0 #107426
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Normalize `--` and case for options in src/tests/build.sh like we do in eng/build(-commons).sh #107425
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Bump Microsoft.Private.Intellisense version to 9.0.0-preview-20240830.1 #107424
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocked
  • [wasm] Implement MINT_SWITCH opcode in jiterpreter #107423
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • codeql fixes #107422
    area-Host
  • Move pinned heap handle table from `BaseDomain` to `AppDomain` and make callers go through the `AppDomain` #107420
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Try to maintain fallthrough in `Compiler::fgSplitEdge` #107419
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP: segv handler #107417
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Check CancellationToken before TimeSpan in TimeProviderTaskExtensions #107416
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Overhaul Main Workflow Docs #107415
    documentation
  • Fix reporting illegal instruction exception #107414
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Make Module::LoadAssembly return Assembly instead of DomainAssembly #107411
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Enable more BinaryFormatter tests #107408
    area-System.Runtime, test-enhancement, binaryformatter-migration
  • JIT: Simplify block insertion logic during loop compaction #107403
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extend the list of recognized `SearchValues<char>` field names in Regex #107402
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 10.0.0
  • [mono][mini] Prefer calling llvmaot compiled method instead of inlining it with JIT #107401
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/9.0] [browser] Fix processing of satellite assemblies from referenced assembly during publish #107398
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [WASI] improve single-threaded threadpool #107395
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [browser][host] Include system environment variables when resolving ASPNETCORE_URLS #107392
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [iOS] [HybridGlobalization] Throw PNSE when methods with matchLength are used #107390
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [mono] Fix SIMD class retrieval and type checks #107388
    arch-arm64, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Add NrbfDecoderFuzzer #107385
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • Disable mutual_recursion test under ilasm round-trip #107384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • docs: fix a typo #106234
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Delay free all ops within conditional select #107036
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Fix stack overflow reporting with multiple PALs #107264
    area-PAL-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Disable subset of the stack overflow tests on ARM #107186
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Build NativeAOT-iOS runtime tests as standalone to restore test runs #107366
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/9.0] Upgrade vendored Brotli dependency to v1.1.0 #107102
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix a case in MethodImpl overriding which wasn't handled as expected in ilc.exe for native aot #107409
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] ComponentModel threading fixes #107353
    Servicing-approved, area-System.ComponentModel, 8.0.10
  • [release/8.0-staging] Backport Azure Linux test changes #107061
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.10
  • [9.0] Upgrade zlib-ng to 2.2.1 #107404
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • [Release/8.0-staging] Reduce net core app current package dependencies #107161
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.10
  • Fix some NRT on StringCollection #106116
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Check CancellationToken before TimeSpan in TimeProviderTaskExtensions #107009
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix copying ephemeral keys to keychains #107041
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.10
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix copying ephemeral keys to keychains #107046
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.34
  • [release/9.0] Fix meter/instrument filtering in MetricsEventSource #107373
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 9.0.0
  • Fix a case in MethodImpl overriding which wasn't handled as expected in ilc.exe for native aot #106716
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Upgrade zlib-ng to 2.2.1 #105771
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [wasi] WasmTestRunnerDir #107389
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Run stress pipelines on release/9.0 #107356
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove implicit fallthrough assumption in `fgExpandRarelyRunBlocks` #107350
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Fix processing of satellite assemblies from referenced assembly during publish #106696
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeouts in CacheTests #107278
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [mono][ci] Include PDBs from runtime pack when building on Helix if required #107348
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser][host] Include system environment variables when resolving ASPNETCORE_URLS #107293
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0

Updated

  • [wasm] more cases when looking up unmanaged delegates #107113
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 10.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2532040 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [NRBF] Fix bugs discovered by the fuzzer #107368
    binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • Add $(crossArg) to superpmi-collect-job #107277
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Remove ILLink support for field init substitutions #107380
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/6.0] ComponentModel threading fixes #107354
    Servicing-approved, area-System.ComponentModel, 6.0.35
  • Add support disclaimer to data-formats.md #107341
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • SuperPMI: ASPNET Collection job #106844
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Simplify block insertion logic during loop canonicalization #107371
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64: Don't emit `mov` for zero case in jump tables for shift intrinsics #107322
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Run native aot runtime tests on cet compatible machines #105288
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Update ABI doc #107286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] Implement MONO_MEMORY_BARRIER in jiterpreter #107325
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix wrong drive format on Unix #107365
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Implement IEnumerator<T> on ref struct enumerators #106309
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add managed Mac signing implementation #107378
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • [JIT] Enable EGPRs in JIT by adding REX2 encoding to the backend. #106557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Provide System.CodeDom package readme #107372
    area-System.CodeDom, community-contribution
  • Remove thread contention from Activity Start/Stop #107333
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Use system brotli on Unix non-portable builds #107225
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make missing framework error message list other architectures that were found #107156
    area-Host
  • Fixing System.Array constructor #107266
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Empty slice fix #107316
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Add a SearchValues implementation for values with unique low nibbles #106900
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging][infra][android] Fix Android helix queue name #107023
    Servicing-approved, os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.10
  • [release/8.0][no-merge][testing][infra] Verify Apple mobile platforms on iOS 17 and XCode 15 #107021
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos
  • Do not over-align code when JitAlignLoops=0 is set #107340
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • add support for parallel Connect #106374
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix hardware exception context extraction on Rosetta #107199
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.10
  • [release/8.0-staging] [Mono AOT] Fix error when returning zero sized struct #107198
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.10
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that AdvSimd.Insert doesn't zero out the upper bits #107091
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `BBF_FAILED_VERIFICATION` and `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #93483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix infinite loop in genCreateAddrMode #106767
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that integer parsing correctly handles non-zero fractional data #106701
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, 8.0.10
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix a set of minor DAC bugs I encountered recently #104919
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Update RedHat 7 -> 8 -- release/6.0-staging #105063
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0-staging] Sys.RT.Caching.MemoryCache - Remove unhandled exception handler #106220
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, 6.0.x
  • Remove helper method frame from Profiler hooks #107152
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove Helper Method Frames for Exception, GC and Thread methods #107218
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Keep using RO metadata after creating IMetaDataImporter for PDB reading #93902
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow op inside conditionalselect to be non HWintrinsic #107180
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 128.0.6613.113, windows: 128.0.6613.86 #107259
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Clean emsdk setup #106403
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Include .NET version in templates package id #107182
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Add FreeBSD as valid test host. #106302
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Consider necessary EETypes with metadata constructed #107347
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix Int32 to Unsigned overflow check #107024
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Fix some minor errors #107179
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [WASI] System.Net.NameResolution #107351

  • Binary writer fix #107369
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Move TLS tests to unsupported list #107236
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
